page.shortlink: Creating Custom Stylesheets in Layout table reports
page.topic: Creating Custom Stylesheets in Layout Table Reports
page.description: Custom stylesheets can be created for Layout Table Reports.

section.description: In the Quick Report Genie, you can click the 'New Style Sheet...' hyperlink.
In the Layout Table Report editor when you select the 'Apply or Create Stylesheet..' menu, you can then click the 'New Style Sheet' button shown below.
When you select the New Style Sheet option, you get a dialog that allows you to define the color and other properties of the style.
